This requires an Athletics check against the victim's Fortitude DC if the victim is grabbed and is automatic for any of the other conditions. The victim is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}, and the vetalarana regains [[/br 14 #Hit Points]]{14 HP}, gaining any excess as temporary Hit Points. Draining Thoughts from a creature that is already stupefied doesn't restore any HP to the vetalarana but increases the victim's stupefied value by 1. Additionally, the vetalarana views one of the victim's memories.

A victim's stupefied condition value decreases by 1 every week.

A victim that becomes stupefied 5 in this way is rendered comatose, becoming permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}. As long as the vetalarana lives, a comatose victim can't regain consciousness, and its stupefied condition doesn't decrease.

Paralyzing Claws.name: Paralyzing Claws
Paralyzing Claws.description: Any living creature hit by a vetalarana manipulator's claw Strike must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:27] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}. The target can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns to end the effect, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save.

Violent Shove.name: Violent Shove
Violent Shove.disable: @Check[type:occultism|dc:19|name:Disperse the Force] (trained) to disperse the force or @Check[type:religion|dc:20|name:Ward yourself from harm] (trained) to ward yourself from harm
Violent Shove.hazarddescription: An invisible force bats creatures aside, hurling them into a nearby wall.
Violent Shove.stealthdetails: (trained) to feel an ominous presence in the room

Shove.name: Shove
Shove.description:
触发 A creature moves adjacent to the haunted wall

效果 A powerful force sweeps across the room, shoving all creatures in the room toward the wall. Each creature in the area must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is pushed 5 feet toward the wall. If the creature would collide with the wall, they take [[/r {1d10+5}[bludgeoning]]]{1d10+5 bludgeoning伤害}.

Failure The creature is pushed 10 feet toward the wall. If the creature would collide with the wall, they take [[/r {2d10+10}[bludgeoning]]]{2d10+10 bludgeoning伤害}.

Critical Failure The creature is pushed 15 feet toward the wall. If the creature would collide with the wall, they take [[/r {3d10+15}[bludgeoning]]]{3d10+15 bludgeoning伤害} and are knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}.

Waldgeist.name: Waldgeist
Waldgeist.publicNotes:
Waldgeists act as avatars of nature that seek vengeance for environmental abuse, such as pollution and deforestation. These undead spirits of destroyed trees form at the site of their destruction or in a nearby woodland, if the original location was entirely razed. They become guardians of the forest, possessing power over the plants within its boundaries. Waldgeists show no mercy to anyone caught damaging their bonded woodland, attacking loggers, fey, travelers, and invasive species with equal prejudice.

When disaster befalls the natural world, a different kind of undead may rise, entirely unlike risen humanoids. Most plants, fish, insects, and other animals don't possess a psychology complex enough to experience the emotional catharsis required to return as undead without intervention from an outside force. Mass extinction can serve as that outside force.

Humanoids clear-cutting an entire forest or a seaside community wiping out a species critical to their ecosystem can spawn a verdorite. The collective spiritual energy and emotional distress of a dying biome powers these undead, formed as conglomerates or representatives.

Forest Guardian.name: Forest Guardian
Forest Guardian.description: A waldgeist is compelled to investigate the sound of wood or trees being damaged, such as by being burned or chopped down. A waldgeist that hears such a sound must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:26] save or spend all their actions moving toward the sound until they identify the cause. This can't be used to compel a waldgeist to leave their bonded woodland. A waldgeist that succeeds at their saving throw is temporarily immune for 10 minutes.

Woodland Dependent.name: Woodland Dependent
Woodland Dependent.description: A waldgeist is mystically bonded to a single forest, jungle, orchard, grove, or other similar large, wooded area and must remain within it. If the waldgeist moves outside their bonded woodland, they're immediately destroyed.

Lignify.name: Lignify
Lignify.description: The touch of a waldgeist transforms flesh into wood. A living creature damaged by the waldgeist's lignifying hand Strike must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} (or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2} on a critical failure). Further failed saves against lignify increases the slowed condition. Once a creature's actions are reduced to 0 by lignify, that creature becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Petrified}, except they're transformed into wood instead of stone.

Possess Tree.name: Possess Tree
Possess Tree.description:
频率 once per 10 minutes

效果 The waldgeist touches a tree to merge with it, possessing it for up to 1 minute. They can end this possession early as a free action at the start of their turn. While the waldgeist possesses a tree, they lose the incorporeal trait, fly Speed, all resistances, their non-constant spells, and their lignifying hand Strike. Additionally, their size increases to Huge, they gain resistance 5 to bludgeoning and piercing damage, weakness 10 to fire, Speed 20 feet, and the following branch Strike.

Melee 1 branch (reach 15 feet) [[/r 1d20+20 #Branch Strike]]{+20}, Damage [[/r {2d12+9}[bludgeoning]]]{2d12+9 bludgeoning}.

While a waldgeist possesses a tree, any damage that would be dealt to the waldgeist is instead dealt to the tree. The tree has 60 Hit Points. When the tree is reduced to 0 Hit Points, the waldgeist is immediately ejected, and the tree is destroyed.

Weight of Guilt.name: Weight of Guilt
Weight of Guilt.disable: @Check[type:religion|dc:26|name:Disrupt the haunt] (expert) to disrupt the haunt through prayer or @Check[type:deception|dc:27|name:Openly defy your regrets] (expert) to openly defy your regrets and banish the haunt. Creatures who haven't committed sins or already made amends for their transgressions are immune to the effects of this haunt.
Weight of Guilt.hazarddescription: Influenced by the guilt and regrets of the dead, creatures are wrapped in weighted chains that embody their own sins.
Weight of Guilt.stealthdetails: (expert) to sense an oppressive aura of sorrow

Mental Bind.name: Mental Bind
Mental Bind.description:
触发 A creature enters the area

效果 Each creature within 30 feet becomes wrapped in heavy spectral chains forged from its own sins and regrets. Each must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:25] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speeds for 1 round.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} until it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{Escapes} (DC 25).

Critical Failure As failure, and the creature is overwhelmed with guilt, becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} for 1 day.

Wight Commander.name: Wight Commander
Wight Commander.publicNotes:
When the beloved leader of a military unit is raised as a wight, sometimes the spirits of their comrades return with them, creating a gestalt being of impeccable tactical acumen.

Wights are undead beings of spite who primarily stalk places related to death.

Final Spite.name: Final Spite
Final Spite.description:
触发 The wight commander is reduced to 0 Hit Points

效果 The wight commander blows a battered war horn before being destroyed. The unnerving blast summons reinforcements, raising [[/r 1d4 #Corspes]]{1d4 corpses} in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:200] as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.ZPjQkKVMi3xoPcU0]{Wights}.

Coordinated Strike.name: Coordinated Strike
Coordinated Strike.description: The wight commander flanks with an ally as long as the target is within both their reaches, even if commander and ally aren't on opposite sides.

Drain Life.name: Drain Life
Drain Life.description: When the hunter wight damages a living creature using an unarmed attack or their bound weapon, they gain 12 temporary Hit Points, and the creature must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:29] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}. Further damage dealt by the hunter wight's unarmed and bound weapon attacks increases the value of the drained condition by 1 on a failed save, to a maximum of drained 4.

Spawn Wight Soldier.name: Spawn Wight Soldier
Spawn Wight Soldier.description: A living humanoid killed by a wight commander's weapon or claw Strike rises as a wight of of the commander's level or lower, most often a hunter wight or prowler wight, after [[/r 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}. This spawn is under the command of the wight commander that killed them. They don't have drain life or spawn wight soldier and are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} for as long as they're a wight spawn. If the creator of the wight spawn dies, the wight spawn becomes a fully autonomous wight; they regain their free will, gain drain life and spawn wight soldier, and are no longer clumsy.

Tactical Direction.name: Tactical Direction
Tactical Direction.description: Each wight ally in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30] gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.hFtNbo1LKYCoDy2O]{借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity} reaction until the end of their next turn.

Withered.name: Withered
Withered.publicNotes:
If a husk zombie survives for several years, their body continues to dry out, their flesh hardens, and their eyes turn into pale, glowing orbs set deep into otherwise empty sockets. Known as the withered, these zombies are cunning, capable of forming complex plans and even setting traps utilizing their less-intelligent brethren to lure the unsuspecting into deadly ambushes.

Simple to create and varied in purpose, these shambling undead are often used for their strength and endless stamina to conduct boring, repetitive tasks.

Slow.name: Slow
Slow.description: A withered is permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} and can't use reactions.

Sneak Attack.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
Sneak Attack.description:
The withered zombie deals an additional 2d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Sudden Surge.name: Sudden Surge
Sudden Surge.description:
触发 The husk zombie's turn begins

效果 The withered has a sudden burst of speed. They are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} this turn and can use the extra action only to Stride or Strike. If the withered's first action this turn is a melee Strike, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} against the attack.

The withered can't use Sudden Surge for [[/r 1d4 #Recharge]]{1d4轮}.

Wolf Skeleton.name: 骷髅狼 Wolf Skeleton
Wolf Skeleton.publicNotes:
没有了肉体的负担，骷髅狼以骇人的速度冲越战场。

在亡者的行列中，没有哪种不死有着如骷髅一般无穷的数量与种类。虽然大多数骷髅几乎完全由骨头构成，但少部分还保留着一些肉屑来帮助它们运动，比如翼膜。

Surge of Speed.name: 急速猛冲 Surge of Speed
Surge of Speed.description: 骷髅狼行走3次，但它直到下回合开始前都@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}。

Zombie Lord.name: Zombie Lord
Zombie Lord.publicNotes:
Cunning zombie lords command their lesser kin, which they can use in unexpected ways. They have been known to direct or collaborate with husk and withered zombies, creating cells of intelligent zombies hiding within the ranks of mindless undead.

Simple to create and varied in purpose, these shambling undead are often used for their strength and endless stamina to conduct boring, repetitive tasks.

Command Zombie.name: Command Zombie
Command Zombie.description:
The zombie lord intones blasphemous words to gain control over a zombie they can see within 100 feet. A zombie that is mindless and not under someone else's control falls under their control automatically; otherwise, the zombie or its controller can attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:22] save to avoid it being controlled (whichever has the higher modifier). The target zombie is temporarily immune for 24 hours if successful. The attempt fails if the zombie is the same level as the zombie lord or higher

The zombie remains controlled by the zombie lord until either is destroyed. A zombie lord can control up to 8 zombies at a time. If the zombie lord would control a number of zombies over this limit, they choose which to release.

Create Zombies.name: Create Zombies
Create Zombies.description: A zombie lord can create lesser zombies with a 1-hour ritual. During this time, the zombie lord chants and performs an unholy dance over the corpses they intend to animate. Unlike normal rituals, this doesn't require a skill check or cost. At the end of this hour, the zombie lord can create one 1st- or 2nd-level zombie, or two zombies of level 0 or lower. These are automatically under the zombie lord's control and count toward the limit of Command Zombie. Any zombies created by the zombie lord still count toward the XP budget of an encounter normally.

Shamble Forth!.name: Shamble Forth!
Shamble Forth!.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 Each zombie controlled by the zombie lord Strides 5 feet (or Burrows, Climbs, Flies, or Swims 5 feet if it has the corresponding movement type).

Zombie Mammoth.name: Zombie Mammoth
Zombie Mammoth.publicNotes:
This monstrous creature can overrun defenses and stomp foes into the ground, making it a terror on any battlefield.

Simple to create and varied in purpose, these shambling undead are often used for their strength and endless stamina to conduct boring, repetitive tasks.

Severed Trunk.name: Severed Trunk
Severed Trunk.description:
When the zombie mammoth is hit by a critical hit that deals slashing damage, the mammoth's trunk is severed from its body. Any creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} with the trunk is released, and the mammoth loses its trunk Strike and Greater Constrict.

The trunk slithers across the battlefield, still animated, and acts in initiative right after the mammoth. It retains Greater Constrict and trunk Strikes but can't use tusk Strikes, foot Strikes, or Shambling Trample. It has all the stats of the mammoth, except its AC is reduced to 23, it has only 50 Hit Points, and its Speed is 10 feet. Damage dealt to the severed trunk has no effect on the zombie mammoth.

Slow.name: Slow
Slow.description: A zombie mammoth is permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} and can't use reactions.

Shambling Trample.name: Shambling Trample
Shambling Trample.description:
Large or smaller, 脚踩, @Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true]

The zombie mammoth Strides up to its Speed instead of double.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Trample]

Zombie Owlbear.name: Zombie Owlbear
Zombie Owlbear.publicNotes:
Zombie owlbears combine an owlbear's ferocity with mindless undead hatred. Once it draws near, it often stands up, unleashing a guttural, wet roar, before charging into combat without thought of self-preservation.

Simple to create and varied in purpose, these shambling undead are often used for their strength and endless stamina to conduct boring, repetitive tasks.

Slow.name: Slow
Slow.description: A zombie owlbear is permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} and can't use reactions.

Ground Slam.name: Ground Slam
Ground Slam.description:
需求 The zombie owlbear has a creature @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} with its talons

效果 The zombie owlbear repeatedly slams the creature into the ground. This deals [[/r {1d10+7}[bludgeoning]]]{1d10+7 bludgeoning伤害} (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:20|basic:true]). On a critical failure, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}, and on a critical success the creature is no longer grabbed or restrained.

Horrifying Screech.name: Horrifying Screech
Horrifying Screech.description:
The zombie owlbear unleashes a broken, snarling screech that unnerves those who hear it. Each creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:19] save. Regardless of the result, creatures are temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{Fleeing} for 1 round and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}.

Zombie Snake.name: Zombie Snake
Zombie Snake.publicNotes:
At around 5 feet long, this massive, rotting serpent lacks potent venom, but its bite still injects putrid fluid that can cause infection.

Simple to create and varied in purpose, these shambling undead are often used for their strength and endless stamina to conduct boring, repetitive tasks.

Slow.name: Slow
Slow.description: A zombie snake is permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} and can't use reactions.

Filth Fever.name: Filth Fever
Filth Fever.description:
The sickened and unconscious conditions from filth fever can't end or be reduced until the disease is cured

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:14]

阶段1 携带但不发病([[/r 1d4 #Stage 1]]{1d4 hours})

阶段2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} (1天)

阶段3 sickened 1 and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} (1天)

阶段4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} (1天)

阶段5 dead

Minister Of Tumult.name: 祸国宰主 Minister Of Tumult
Minister Of Tumult.hp: 快速愈合10，负能量治疗，一息尚存
Minister Of Tumult.senses: 呼吸感知（精确）60尺，黑暗视觉
Minister Of Tumult.publicNotes:
僵尸是源自天夏（Tian Xia）、跳跃前进的骇人吸血鬼。虽然它和其他吸血鬼类似——它们都是不死生物、都从活物身上吸取生命力、都只能通过某种特殊方式杀死——但僵尸是以活人的呼吸（又称为气或ki）为食，而不是血。相较于其他吸血鬼，僵尸虽拥有独特的力量，包括能够偏转魔法的纸符箓、非凡的跳跃能力、不惧阳光，它们也有其独特的弱点，如除非通过感知呼吸否则看不见活物、对钟和镜子的厌恶、以及近乎于昏厥的忧郁症。值得庆幸的是，大多数僵尸没有创造吸血鬼衍体的能力。

祸国宰主是一位杀戮大师。它们通过从无数凡人身上夺走的气，将自己的能力提升到超自然的水平。许多僵尸宰主统治着定居点，甚至整个城邦，威吓它们的臣民绝对服从于自己。

祸国宰主控制下的居住点或城市在外人眼中，运行流畅得仿佛一部时钟。守卫巡逻、街头清扫、马车和更多东西都在设定好的时间到达，不早也不晚。对于一个不理会居民脸上笑容背后的不安的游客来说，祸国宰主的封地似乎是一个绝妙的居住地。但事实要可怕得多。祸国宰主通过汲取罪人的气来控制和充盈自己的气。如果祸国宰主饿了并且没有任何严重的罪行发生，他们会单纯地对轻微的罪行、违规行为或仅仅未能充分履行职责给予这种惩罚。这使人们受到控制，因为似乎总可以通过完美的表现来避免惩罚。

XyO3dvZ3nK3xea9x.name: 呼吸感知（精确）60尺
XyO3dvZ3nK3xea9x.description: 僵尸只能靠呼吸来感知5尺外的生物。列出的范围（60尺）内的生物只要屏住呼吸，其对于僵尸而言就是@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}的。为了用这种方式屏住呼吸，生物必须腾出一只手来完全堵住鼻子或捂住嘴巴。

Jiang-Shi Vulnerabilities.name: 僵尸弱点 Jiang-Shi Vulnerabilities
Jiang-Shi Vulnerabilities.description:
所有僵尸都拥有以下弱点。

  • 厌恶僵尸无法主动靠近一个挥舞的镜子或摇响的手钟10尺内。生物可以通过与镜子或手钟交互，从而挥舞或摇响该物体一轮（类似举起盾牌）。如果僵尸非自愿地来到了厌恶之物的10尺内，其获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{逃跑 Fleeing}状态，逃离至其厌恶对象的10尺以外。在暴露于其厌恶之物下一轮之后，僵尸可以花费一个拥有专注特征的动作尝试一次@Check[type:will|dc:25]检定。一旦成功，它能在[[/r 1d6 #rounds]]{1d6轮}内克服其厌恶（大成功则为1小时）。
  • 苦涩顿悟 僵尸一旦意识到自己堕落的本性和其存在已经与生命相悖离的真相，就会陷入严重的忧郁中。每当僵尸看见一个祭坛，其上摆着至少1负载的用于供奉给先祖的食物时，它们必须进行@Check[type:will|dc:25]豁免。然后它们会临时免疫苦涩顿悟1分钟。

大成功 僵尸不受影响。

成功 僵尸获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}，持续1轮。

失败 僵尸获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}，持续1分钟。

大失败 僵尸获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}，持续1分钟。

One More Breath.name: 一息尚存 One More Breath
One More Breath.description: 与其他不死生物不同，僵尸不会在HP为0时被摧毁。取而代之的是，它会@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}，于1分钟后苏醒并具有1点生命值。将至少1负载的糯米或鸡蛋撒在无意识的僵尸身上将会永久摧毁它们。如果僵尸的HP是被暗木武器的攻击降低到0，它们立刻被摧毁。

Warped Fulu.name: 扭曲符箓 Warped Fulu
Warped Fulu.description: 僵尸已经腐化了贴在它们额头上的符箓。僵尸免疫那些从魔法物品上施展且不需要消耗法术位的法术，例如卷轴或魔杖。一个生物可以使用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{盗窃 Steal}技能动作来移除僵尸的符箓，投骰对抗僵尸的察觉DC。这会立即终止僵尸对这些效果的免疫。如果一个生物随后用一个交互动作摧毁一只僵尸被移除的符箓，僵尸也将失去@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.fJSNOw4zHGbIm4bZ]{快速愈合 Fast Healing}能力。僵尸能通过用书写工具在一张纸条（或类似的东西）上不间断的写一小时字，来创造一个替代的符箓。

Drain Qi.name: 吸纳阳气 Drain Qi
Drain Qi.description:
需求 一个处于@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}状态下，或自愿的生物正位于僵尸的触及范围内。

效果 僵尸通过呼吸来汲取受害者的生命能量，也就是“气”。如果受害者处于擒抱状态，则僵尸需要进行运动检定来对抗受害者的强韧DC，其余情况则无需如此。受害者获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}，僵尸恢复相当于其最大HP10%的HP（[[/r 19 #Hit Points]]{19 HP}），多余的则会作为临时生命获得。从一个已经流失的生物上吸纳阳气并不会为僵尸恢复生命，但会使这个受害者的流失值+1。若受害者有能力施展真气法术，他能花费1点聚能点来避免流失。这只能保护它不受当前的攻击，而不能防止之后的吸纳阳气的效果。

受害者的流失值每周减少1点。如果受害者严格控制饮食，只吃糯米至少1天，并成功通过@Check[type:athletics|dc:25]检定来花费10分钟跳舞、慢跑、或进行其他激烈的体育运动，他的流失值减少1。

Premonition of Death.name: 死亡预感 Premonition of Death
Premonition of Death.description:
触发 宰主骰先攻或它的回合开始

效果 宰相调整身姿应对将要发生的暴力，它使用气冥架式能力。.

Rigor Mortis.name: 尸僵 Rigor Mortis
Rigor Mortis.description: 僵尸无视困难地形和会令它@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}的效果。僵尸不能进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.HYNhdaPtF1QmQbR3]{趴下 Drop Prone}基本动作。每当僵尸@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{跳跃 Leap}时，它不会触发通常会因移动动作触发的反应，例如借机攻击。

w8nbobeosq4s3a35.name: 气冥架式 Stance of Death
w8nbobeosq4s3a35.description:
宰主身上饱满的气让它在任何时候都能完美地控制自己的身体。它采取下列架势之一。

  • 销骨行尸 Bone Corpse 每当宰相在此架势下成功使用吸纳阳气能力后，在1轮中，这个流失的生物在行走的时候必须通过@Check[type:flat|dc:5]检定，否则动作被浪费并@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}。
  • 覆云冥爪 Cloudless Void 僵尸在AC上获得+1环境加值，它们的利爪获得长触及特征；
  • 脉断气绝 Sundered Veins 被僵尸的利爪攻击的生物受到@Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d10.success]。重击时他们还会获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}。

Provincial Jiang-shi.name: 村野僵尸 Provincial Jiang-shi
Provincial Jiang-shi.senses: 呼吸感知（精确）60尺，黑暗视觉
Provincial Jiang-shi.hp: 快速愈合10，负能量治疗，一息尚存
Provincial Jiang-shi.publicNotes:
僵尸是源自天夏（Tian Xia）、跳跃前进的骇人吸血鬼。虽然它和其他吸血鬼类似——它们都是不死生物、都从活物身上吸取生命力、都只能通过某种特殊方式杀死——但僵尸是以活人的呼吸（又称为气或ki）为食，而不是血。相较于其他吸血鬼，僵尸虽拥有独特的力量，包括能够偏转魔法的纸符箓、非凡的跳跃能力、不惧阳光，它们也有其独特的弱点，如除非通过感知呼吸否则看不见活物、对钟和镜子的厌恶、以及近乎于昏厥的忧郁症。值得庆幸的是，大多数僵尸没有创造吸血鬼衍体的能力。

被人从梦中粗暴地惊醒，村野僵尸在它们领地周围的村庄和坟地里游荡，寻找食物。

0a0R5L9eHRL770lk.name: 呼吸感知（精确）60尺
0a0R5L9eHRL770lk.description: 僵尸只能靠呼吸来感知5尺外的生物。列出的范围（60尺）内的生物只要屏住呼吸，其对于僵尸而言就是@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}的。为了用这种方式屏住呼吸，生物必须腾出一只手来完全堵住鼻子或捂住嘴巴。

Jiang-Shi Vulnerabilities.name: 僵尸弱点 Jiang-Shi Vulnerabilities
Jiang-Shi Vulnerabilities.description:
所有僵尸都拥有以下弱点。

  • 厌恶僵尸无法主动靠近一个挥舞的镜子或摇响的手钟10尺内。生物可以通过与镜子或手钟交互，从而挥舞或摇响该物体一轮（类似举起盾牌）。如果僵尸非自愿地来到了厌恶之物的10尺内，其获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{逃跑 Fleeing}状态，逃离至其厌恶对象的10尺以外。在暴露于其厌恶之物下一轮之后，僵尸可以花费一个拥有专注特征的动作尝试一次@Check[type:will|dc:25]检定。一旦成功，它能在[[/r 1d6 #rounds]]{1d6轮}内克服其厌恶（大成功则为1小时）。
  • 苦涩顿悟 僵尸一旦意识到自己堕落的本性和其存在已经与生命相悖离的真相，就会陷入严重的忧郁中。每当僵尸看见一个祭坛，其上摆着至少1负载的用于供奉给先祖的食物时，它们必须进行@Check[type:will|dc:25]豁免。然后它们会临时免疫苦涩顿悟1分钟。

大成功 僵尸不受影响。

成功 僵尸获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}，持续1轮。

失败 僵尸获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}，持续1分钟。

大失败 僵尸获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused}，持续1分钟。

One More Breath.name: 一息尚存 One More Breath
One More Breath.description: 与其他不死生物不同，僵尸不会在HP为0时被摧毁。取而代之的是，它会@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}，于1分钟后苏醒并具有1点生命值。将至少1负载的糯米或鸡蛋撒在无意识的僵尸身上将会永久摧毁它们。如果僵尸的HP是被暗木武器的攻击降低到0，它们立刻被摧毁。

Warped Fulu.name: 扭曲符箓 Warped Fulu
Warped Fulu.description: 僵尸已经腐化了贴在它们额头上的符箓。僵尸免疫那些从魔法物品上施展且不需要消耗法术位的法术，例如卷轴或魔杖。一个生物可以使用@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.RDXXE7wMrSPCLv5k]{盗窃 Steal}技能动作来移除僵尸的符箓，投骰对抗僵尸的察觉DC。这会立即终止僵尸对这些效果的免疫。如果一个生物随后用一个交互动作摧毁一只僵尸被移除的符箓，僵尸也将失去@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.fJSNOw4zHGbIm4bZ]{快速愈合 Fast Healing}能力。僵尸能通过用书写工具在一张纸条（或类似的东西）上不间断的写一小时字，来创造一个替代的符箓。

Drain Qi.name: 吸纳阳气 Drain Qi
Drain Qi.description:
需求 一个处于@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}、@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}状态下，或自愿的生物正位于僵尸的触及范围内。

效果 僵尸通过呼吸来汲取受害者的生命能量，也就是“气”。如果受害者处于擒抱状态，则僵尸需要进行运动检定来对抗受害者的强韧DC，其余情况则无需如此。受害者获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}，僵尸恢复相当于其最大HP10%的HP（[[/r 19 #Hit Points]]{19 HP}），多余的则会作为临时生命获得。从一个已经流失的生物上吸纳阳气并不会为僵尸恢复生命，但会使这个受害者的流失值+1。若受害者有能力施展真气法术，他能花费1点聚能点来避免流失。这只能保护它不受当前的攻击，而不能防止之后的吸纳阳气的效果。

受害者的流失值每周减少1点。如果受害者严格控制饮食，只吃糯米至少1天，并成功通过@Check[type:athletics|dc:25]检定来花费10分钟跳舞、慢跑、或进行其他激烈的体育运动，他的流失值减少1。

Rigor Mortis.name: 尸僵 Rigor Mortis
Rigor Mortis.description: 僵尸无视困难地形和会令它@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}的效果。僵尸不能进行@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.HYNhdaPtF1QmQbR3]{趴下 Drop Prone}基本动作。每当僵尸@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{跳跃 Leap}时，它不会触发通常会因移动动作触发的反应，例如借机攻击。
